resources.string: I am participating in a study of “Comparison of speech analysis and spirometry in asthmatic subjects: A prospective study” of my own free will. I have been explained in detail the aims, objectives, and importance of this study. The method of the study and the details of the same have been explained to me in a language I understand. No pressure has been brought on me to participate in the study. I understand that I can withdraw from the study or refuse permission for my test data to be utilized at any time and without assigning any reasons, and without my withdrawal affecting my care. I have also been explained to and understood the basic details about the spirometry and speech analysis tests performed on me, which I choose to undergo. I am aware of the procedure of the tests and the risks associated which is minimal, however, consent for the procedures. I the undersigned, give my valid written consent to be a participant in this investigation.
